com.undead_pixels.dungeon_bots.scene.entities.actions

Class ActionGroupings.RTSGrouping

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.undead_pixels.dungeon_bots.scene.entities.actions.ActionGroupings.RTSGrouping
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActionGroupings
    Enclosing interface:
    ActionGroupings

    public static class ActionGroupings.RTSGrouping
extends java.lang.Object
implements ActionGroupings
    A grouping that defines an RTS. Actions are allowed to begin at any time, regardless of what else is performing actions.
